value: http://www.fundacionpacita.ph Fundacion Pacita Batanes Nature Lodge

Bgy. Chanarian-Tukon,  Office: +632 9292602, This Batanes resort was once the home studio of renowned artist Pacita Abad. Today, it has been transformed into a lovely building offering charming Batanes accommodation for visitors who want to get closer to nature. It offers 9 rooms, all with viewing decks where you can enjoy the breathtaking landscape of Batanes. Complimentary breakfast is served to all guest, and a half-day heritage tour of the mainland is also included.
